original_text: and having a reputation for good works: if she has brought up children, has shown hospitality, has washed the feet of the saints, has cared for the afflicted, and has devoted herself to every good work.
korean_text: 선한 행실의 증거가 있어 혹은 자녀를 양육하며 혹은 나그네를 대접하며 혹은 성도들의 발을 씻으며 혹은 환난 당한 자들을 구제하며 혹은 모든 선한 일을 행한 자라야 할 것이요

sentences.original_text: and having a reputation for good works
sentences.korean_translation: 선한 행위에 대한 좋은 평판을 가지고 있으며

sentences.original_text: if she has brought up children
has washed the feet of the saints
and has devoted herself to every good work.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 선한 일에 자신을 바쳤다면
